ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T20:12:20 [Issue ID 4000-435246] urn:comicvine:4000-435246 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 01:30:18. [Issue ID 1826214]
ComicInfo.Summary: Fred Perry (Gold Digger, Zombie Kid Diaries, Action Time Buddies) and David Hutchison (Biowulf, Mischief and Mayhem, Steamcraft) team up to provide the most pixelated presentation of putrefied panic to grace the printed page! Zombies are roaming the streets, and no one is safe from being converted or devoured! The graphics may be low-res, but the terror's strictly high-def!
